entry.title: Lung Cancer Screening Saves Lives: What to Know & Expect
entry.summary: November is lung cancer awareness month and one of the most critical times of year for me to talk to my patients about the importance of lung cancer screening, even if you don’t think you may be at risk.

entry.title: Select hotels in UNESCO World Heritage Sites
entry.summary: UNESCO World Heritage sites are unique and stunning landmarks — both natural and manmade — spread across the globe. Visiting them is a terrific way to enjoy new experiences and learn about different cultures.

entry.title: Oregon Department of Forestry seeks nominees for Climate Smart Forestry Award (Photo)
entry.summary: SALEM, Ore. - The Oregon Department of Forestry is now seeking nominations for the agency's 2025 Climate Smart Forestry Award. The deadline to submit a nomination is Dec. 31, 2024. This award recognizes landowners, land managers, researchers, operators, or other forestry professionals who use climate change-adapted practices, or develop innovative methods for carbon capture, retention, or reduced carbon release. New nominations, including self-nominations are accepted. Instructions and nomination form can be found on ODF’s website. According to the Awards Selection Committee, the goal of this award is to recognize exemplary climate and carbon practices in Oregon. The Committee wants to encourage more landowners to adopt such practices. In March 2020, Governor Brown signed an executive orde…
